description: Updates an Amazon Q Business index.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application connected to the index.

parameters.name: indexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business index.

parameters.name: capacityConfiguration
parameters.description: The storage capacity units you want to provision for your Amazon Q Business index. You can add and remove capacity to fit your usage needs. units (integer) --- The number of storage units configured for an Amazon Q Business index.

nested_params.name: units
nested_params.description: The number of storage units configured for an Amazon Q Business index.

parameters.name: documentAttributeConfigurations
parameters.description: Configuration information for document metadata or fields. Document metadata are fields or attributes associated with your documents. For example, the company department name associated with each document. For more information, see Understanding document attributes. (dict) --- Configuration information for document attributes. Document attributes are metadata or fields associated with your documents. name (string) --- The name of the document attribute. type (string) --- The type of document attribute. search (string) --- Information about whether the document attribute can be used by an end user to search for information on their web experience.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the document attribute.

nested_params.name: search
nested_params.description: Information about whether the document attribute can be used by an end user to search for information on their web experience.
